channel.title: W00t get my first ever souce!
channel.description:
HELLO PEOPLE :D this is my first souce i have made and DONT SAY I LECHET
its has many coustome but i need to upload the client on a website :(
i have added many things to the SOUCE like the new ::kbd and ::jad (i had to fix that) i also add ::shops and ::hangout
I ALSO ADD ::STAFFZONE i still edting v2. in v2 its gowing to have its own minegame. MY SERVER HAS SOMMING! SORRY no pics :(.
the souce has a blitin command maker inn the compiler and it has a npcmaker. if some 1 has a shopmaker plz tell me and give me the link :) also play my bro server *
heres the downlode link
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Y6CAZ0P3
so come downlode the souce today cya and peece out

Lol kid if you want people to not talk bad **** about your grammer and your server , then ADD some PICTURES and get the **** off your v2, and work on your grammer! >.> Not downloadng.

item.title: W00t get my first ever souce!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Ok there good buddy.

Let’s fix your Grammar.

Hello people. This is my first source I have made, and DON’T SAY I LEECHED IT!

It has many customs, but I need to upload the client on a website.

I have added many things the the server. Like the new, ::kbd, and ::jad ; (I had to fix that.) I also added, ::shops and ::hangout.

I have also added, ::staffzone. I am still editing the 2nd version of the server. In v2, It’s going to have it’s own minigame. My server has summoning! Sorry all, but I do not have any pictures.

The source has a built-in command maker in the compiler, * Side Note * That makes no fucking sense *. And it has a NPC maker. If someone has a shop maker, please share it with me, and give me the link.

Here is the download link:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Y6CAZ0P3

So, Come download the source today! Bye!

Fucking Copy and Paste that, Over yours.

Ffs

Read full topic
